00009     EventProcessorFactory::EventProcessorFactory() {
00010     }
00011 
00012     void EventProcessorFactory::registerEventProcessor(const std::string& classname, int classtype, EventProcessorMaker* maker) {
00013         auto ptr = moduleInfo_.find(classname);
00014         if (ptr != moduleInfo_.end()) {
00015             EXCEPTION_RAISE("ExistingEventProcessorDefinition", "Already have a module registered with the classname '" + classname + "'");
00016         }
00017         EventProcessorInfo mi;
00018         mi.classname = classname;
00019         mi.classtype = classtype;
00020         mi.maker = maker;
00021         moduleInfo_[classname] = mi;
00022     }
00023 
00024     std::vector<std::string> EventProcessorFactory::getEventProcessorClasses() const {
00025         std::vector<std::string> classes;
00026         for (auto ptr : moduleInfo_) {
00027             classes.push_back(ptr.first);
00028         }
00029         return classes;
00030     }
00031 
00032     int EventProcessorFactory::getEventProcessorClasstype(const std::string& ct) const {
00033         auto ptr = moduleInfo_.find(ct);
00034         if (ptr == moduleInfo_.end()) {
00035             return 0;
00036 
00037         } else {
00038             return ptr->second.classtype;
00039         }
00040     }
00041 
00042     EventProcessor* EventProcessorFactory::createEventProcessor(const std::string& classname, const std::string& moduleInstanceName, Process& process) {
00043         auto ptr = moduleInfo_.find(classname);
00044         if (ptr == moduleInfo_.end()) {
00045             return 0;
00046         }
00047         return ptr->second.maker(moduleInstanceName, process);
00048     }
00049 
00050     void EventProcessorFactory::loadLibrary(const std::string& libname) {
00051         if (librariesLoaded_.find(libname) != librariesLoaded_.end()) {
00052             return; // already loaded
00053         }
00054 
00055         void* handle = dlopen(libname.c_str(), RTLD_NOW);
00056         if (handle == nullptr) {
00057             EXCEPTION_RAISE("LibraryLoadFailure", "Error loading library '" + libname + "':" + dlerror());
00058         }
00059 
00060         librariesLoaded_.insert(libname);
00061     }
00062 
00063 }
